subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Nadal overcame sloppy play on clay, his favorite surface, on Sunday to beat Fabio Fognini, 7-5, 7-5, and win the Hamburg Open for the second time.
snippet: Nadal overcame sloppy play on clay, his favorite surface, on Sunday to beat Fabio Fognini, 7-5, 7-5, and win the Hamburg Open for the second time.
